name: !Flip Legend: Premium
description:
Please Note: This game is paid, ads free, no IAP, small app size, more functionality and better user experience.

The objective of this game is simple : Simply flip the bottle into the air and score points by landing it upright!
Have you ever owned the high score? Now it’s your time to win. Just give it a try!

Instructions:

* Swipe up to flip bottle.
* Adjust swipe so bottle lands upright.
* Get more flips in a row to unlock more bottles.

Features include:

* 10 different items to choose(more to be added soon)!
* Stunning graphics!
* Realistic physics!
* Perform amazing flip trick shots!
* Share your personal record with your friends!
* No internet connection needed.
* Improves Concentration.
* Cool background music and sound effects.
* Optimized for HD res.
* No IAP, ads free and much more......

This simple skill game only takes a few seconds to learn but it could take a lifetime to master. How many times can you flip the bottle before it lands on the table?

Compete with players around the world! Flip the water bottle in the air and land it upright.

Become the master of flip while having fun!!!
